src:
Na dvorišče je nesla smeti. Ko se je vrnila, ga je zalotila
Zgodilo se je na območju Radovljice.
07 Nov 2019, 10:09 by A. L.
RADOVLJICA – Radovljiški policisti so v sredo obravnavali prijavo občanke, ki je v svojem stanovanju zalotila neznanca. Z njim sta se srečala na hodniku, ko je na dvorišče odnesla smeti.Za dejanje policisti obravnavajo eno osebo, poroča PU Kranj.
text:
She dumped garbage in the yard. When she came back, she stalked him
It happened in the Radovljica area.
07 Nov 2019, 10:09 by A.L.
RADOVLJICA - Police in Radovljica on Wednesday handled an application from a stranger who found a stranger in her apartment. They met with him in the hallway when she dumped garbage in the yard. For the act, police officers are treating one person, the Kranj Police Department reports.
